story_teamflare_01_09000/2401_1001_0200_: You’re Malva! A member of the Kalos Elite Four!
story_teamflare_01_09000/2401_1001_0300_: Yes, I am. Pleasure to meet you.
story_teamflare_01_09000/2401_1001_0500_: It seems you all were able to resolve it, though.
story_teamflare_01_09000/2401_1001_0600_:
By the way... Where were you all this
time, Looker?
story_teamflare_01_09000/2401_1001_0700_: I had a minor errand to take care of.
story_teamflare_01_09000/2401_1001_0900_:
Me and Mimi worked hard together and protected
this city!
story_teamflare_01_09000/2401_1001_1000_:
That’s great, Emma! You played such a big part in
it, too!
story_teamflare_01_09000/2401_1001_1300_:
If you don’t help and our weapon gets stolen by
the traitors...
story_teamflare_01_09000/2401_1001_1400_:
Then, as a member of Team Flare, I have no
choice but to be a bit forceful in order to dispose
of the traitors.
story_teamflare_01_09000/2401_1001_1500_:
Power must be fought with power and weapons
with weapons...
story_teamflare_01_09000/2401_1001_1600_:
If we don’t, there’s a chance that such a powerful
weapon might accidentally hurt those children...
story_teamflare_01_09000/2401_1001_1800_: What’s wrong, Mr. Looker? You look scary.
story_teamflare_01_09000/2401_1001_2000_:
I’ve sneakily positioned members of Team Flare
dressed as civilians at a number of spots on Pasio.
story_teamflare_01_09000/2401_1001_2100_:
They’re prepared to spring into action on
my signal...
story_teamflare_01_09000/2401_1001_2200_: Much like they showed you earlier.
story_teamflare_01_09000/2401_1001_2400_: At this point, you don’t have much of a choice.
